alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 2:09PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. West wind gusting 35 to 45 mph over exposed ridges and open terrain. * WHERE...Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind will create hazardous travel over Salt River Pass and in the backcountry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow totals over the southern end of the mountains will range from 8 to 14.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
